name: Pandora - Minimal Dark (HTML5)
description:
A dark, minimalist take on Pandora. This version is intended for use with the new HTML5 site. Created primarily for my own use, however if a recommendation is made that I personally like, I may implement it.

Feel free to leave impressions, or possible requests in the comments below.
additional_info:
update 07/25 - Corrected formatting to account for "right-rail" (right side ad bar) and removed additional background that was embedded in latest update.

update 11/12 - Corrected the search bar spacing at the top that was still off from the "right-rail" update, as well as corrected the search bar active state to not darken the entire screen, as well as slightly brightening some text to make text more visible now that it is smaller.

update 01/19 - Further updates to right-rail, should be perfectly centered now, more improvements to readability.

update 03/08 - Minor changes to match updates on site.
